name: Extreme Truck Simulator
description: Extreme Truck Simulator is a new funny truck game unique through its gameplay. If you thought this truck simulator will be easy, think again!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel i3 Graphics: GT 730 Storage: 200 MB available space
